long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING)
Generate beautiful palettes right from the browser tab.

Get inspired by a new color scheme every tab and create your own beautiful palettes with this light version of the Coolors super fast generator.

How to use it:

• Press the spacebar to generate color schemes
• Click on the lock icon to keep your favorite colors
• Press again the spacebar to let the app to find the matching colors for you
• Click on the HEX value to insert your own starting colors
• Copy the color codes or export your palettes in several formats via the website

Enjoy Coolors for Chrome!
